name: Dr. McNinja\u2019s Radical Adventures!
blurb: Help everyone\u2019s favorite Ninja Doctor with his first foray into a most radical medium: Video Games!

rewards.reward: No Reward
10,000 Shamrock Points (once our point system is in place). This will be enough to unlock all of the content but not all of the initial power-ups at launch.

100,000 Shamrock Points (once our point system is in place). This will be enough to unlock everything at launch and still have enough for several more content updates. \r\n\r\nAll contributions above this level will also get this reward.

An exclusive in game playable character, available only to Kickstarter backers! Play through the game as the mysterious Dr. McLuchador! This of course includes 100k points. You can also add 10$ to any higher level reward tier to add a McLuchador unlock to it.
2\u201d Dr. McNinja\u2019s Radical Adventures Button, choose Judy or McNinja.\r\n\r\nOr for 5$ more you can get both!
Dr. McNinja\u2019s Radical Adventures Monochromatic T-shirt.

4 limited run bottles of Dr. McNinja's Radical Adventures soda. 100% of your daily recomended dose of awesomeness, and no caffeine (Drs. don't typically approve of caffeine).

You can add 40$ to any other backer level to receive this as well as another reward.

This unfortunately is not available for international backers (unless you want to add 50$ in shipping)

5 special 2" Dr. McNinja's radical adventures buttons. One for each of the following characters: Dr. McNinja, Judy, Dr. McLuchador, King Radical, and Zombie Benjamin Franklin. Please include 15$ shipping for international. This level includes 100K Shamrock points.

Dr. McNinja\u2019s Radical Adventures guest comic, signed by Alisa Christopher (our Art Director and Lead Artist). This and all levels above this get 100,000 shamrock points once our point system is launched.

Another exclusive in game playable character available only for Kickstarter backers! Play through the game as King Radical himself, on his radical Skateboard. This also unlocks Dr. McLuchador, and includes 100k points. You can add $10 to this reward to include a monochrome t-shirt, or add 10$ to any higher tier to include both of these character unlocks!

De habla hispana! Seleccione esta recompensa a votar para soporte del idioma espa\u00f1ol. Si 50 personas elige esta opci\u00f3n, vamos a apoyar espa\u00f1ol en la primera versi\u00f3n.  *Spanish Speakers! Select this reward to vote for Spanish language support. If 50 people select this reward, we'll include Spanish support in the first release.* We apologize if we butchered your language there...
The comic book, 4 bottles of McNinja Soda, the monochrome t-shirt, and two buttons, all in one convenient pack.
*International Edition* The comic book, the monochrome t-shirt, and two buttons, all in one convenient pack. This includes international shipping and is sans sodas, so no need to pay extra.

Dancing Zombie Benjamin Franklin Unlocked! That's right, the third Kickstarter exclusive character unlock. This includes an unlock of Dr. McLuchador, King Radical on a Skateboard, Zombie Ben Franklin, and of course 100k Points. Add $10 to include a monochrome t-shirt with this reward, or add 10$ to any higher reward to include all three character unlocks with it!
Full Color Dr. McNinja\u2019s Radical Adventures T-shirt signed by the game staff and your name as a contributor in the game.

Your likeness included in the game as an enemy and a special game account that has everything available always unlocked, for life. Your name will also be listed as a contributor in the game's credits. Plus choose any one of the physical rewards from a lower tier to include, yes you can choose the combo pack. This level also comes with all three of the Kickstarter promo playable characters.

A custom, signed and framed, piece of artwork made especially for you by the man behind Dr. McNinja himself, Christopher Hastings. You choose a character and he'll make a unique sketch, one of a kind, completely original. Includes a signature and a certificate indicating that you were one of the lucky few who received one of these for your contribution to this project. This level also includes all three of the Kickstarter promo playable characters.
One of 20 Ultra Limited Edition hand painted 3\u201d Dr. McNinja figures and your name as a contributor in the game.

The Completionists Package! For those of you who REALLY like Dr. McNinja, you can get everything we are offering, one of each item: A custom game enemy in your likeness, a signed piece of custom artwork by Christopher Hastings, a 3" Painted mini, a Full-Color t-shirt, a Mono-Chrome t-shirt, Our guest comic, 4 bottles of McNinja soda, A Judy and a McNinja pin, Your Name as an Executive Contributor in the credits, and an eternal account that will always get the latest powerups and content packs automagically unlocked! If you want it all, this is the only way to go. This level also includes all three of the Kickstarter promo playable characters.

The Whole Shebang! We arrange a special meeting between you and a few other lucky Backers in New York City with Christopher Hastings, the man behind McNinja. You get everything listed above, plus a pizza party where you can hang out with the artist and a few other die hard fans. Christopher will likely have some surprises for you as well. Your contribution covers airfare to and from New York from anywhere in the US. This level also includes all three of the Kickstarter promo playable characters.
